website_summaries.verdict: Eye-catching bingo set with master board that helps you keep track of called numbers.
pros: Durable and sturdy cage with wooden handle
Master board is easy to read
This set has a professional look to it
cons: It's pricey, and no playing cards are included with purchase

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the Jumbo bingo cage!
customer_reviews.text: This bingo cage is larger than I expected but it seems well constructed... I do believe it will last for years. However the plastic B I N G O board where you place the balls after they are called, is not as durable and will be easily broken. After reading some other reviews that the balls would shoot past the rails, I would like to add that's not been my experience with this cage... the balls stay on the track fine. It is expensive for what it is but it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good so far. Well built!! Had to spread a couple wires apart so the balls would go thru the drop. We also got 2-N32 balls. Will be contacting the company on that one.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G Ambler Jr

customer_reviews.title: Professional Bingo put "Classy" into a family get-together
customer_reviews.text: What a hit Bingo was at our 4th of July Extravaganza. It was sweet family fun and lotsa laughs. Thanks Charlie, you were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbud

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for senior citizens. First of all it’s very slow in the cage where the little cup catches the balls and sends them to the ramp. Then almost any time they come down they fly off. Hard to turn. Would like to know from seller how to keep balls from flying all over and then so many turns to have the balls come out to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great bingo cage!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun bingo cage! It brings out more excitement when playing bingo!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Only down side is that the box to store it in takes up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Peel

customer_reviews.title: Seems well put together
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived and everything seemed intact. Display board was hard to snap together and I was afraid I would break it. All balls were there and the cage worked fine except sometimes you have to turn it a few times for the cup to catch the bingo ball. Overall seems well putt together and I can't wait to use it at our family's Thanksgiving gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This came with no pin to close the door. Also has some type of bar inside that is knocking multiple balls out while it spins.
customer_reviews.author: GMM1219

customer_reviews.title: High quality sturdy unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived as advertised. No damage and all the pieces were present, including the ping pong balls. Very pleased so far. I have not had a chance to use during a bingo game as of yet. I did played around with it soon after opening, and I am pleased at the quality of construction.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Hero

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Balls fall out when turning. Balls roll off the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Norma  O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Family bingo night was and will be a total hit while using this! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: David M. More

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our employee Christmas Party. Arrived in excellent condition. Great product. Colored balls were nice for changing up games. We played a few “4 corner” games and it was easy to pass by the ones we didn’t need.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: missing the ping pong balls with numbers on it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. I received my order and it was late. Then to add insult to injury it is missing the balls for the bingo game. I ordered it to use the next week. How can you not fulfill the most important part of bingo.... the numbers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes of course I have received my order with great satisfaction. Great service guys
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys thank you very much. Yes of course I have received my order with great satisfaction. Great service guys! Keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: ioane ono

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit for our family Christmas party!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! We were bored with the gift exchange ritual. This woke everyone up and we had so much fun!! Can't wait for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a larger ball for better viewing and it works!
customer_reviews.author: VailCo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is really big, it was a hit at my husbands 60th bday....
customer_reviews.author: cinnell

customer_reviews.title: happy with product
customer_reviews.text: got exactly what I ordered, timely manner, sturdy and easy for elderly residents of senior community to read and use
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good thing to have for family Bingo nights
customer_reviews.text: Bingo nights were raised to a new level!!! So much more fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Talipandas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with my order. Me and my friends are enjoying playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Yoni Austria

customer_reviews.title: No Balls
customer_reviews.text: I just got my package today and sadly it did not have the balls in the box as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tara White

customer_reviews.title: Great just need a bag for the cage & balls
customer_reviews.text: I like it was great at the family gathering. Just need a bag for the cage to go in and the ball
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked cards to be included and even a case to ...
customer_reviews.text: HUGE but squeals. I do not think the price is justified for this item. I would have liked cards to be included and even a case to store this big bulky item.
customer_reviews.author: UnikTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine
customer_reviews.text: We played 10 games and worked just fine. The box did come a little roughed up but based on the way our mail man drives there's no telling how many pot holes he hit. It is possible to spin and throw a ball out missing the chute but it simply drops down under the cage and you pick it up. Not a lot of things in this world perfect, so we were just fine with it. Maybe happened 1 every 100 balls and probably was the operator spinning to fast or slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Regal Games Jumbo Professional Red Bingo Cage with Multicolor Ping Pong Bingo Balls
feature_bullets: VALUE: Includes jumbo red cage, 75 multi colored ping pong balls, and master board
QUALITY: Improved clasp prevents ping pong balls from falling out
DESIGN: Weighted cup automatically selects balls without getting caught
CONSTRUCTION: The cage is made from a heavy guage material with a protective coating that is built to last
ALL THE GAMES YOU LOVE: The Jumbo Red Professional Bingo Cage Set provides hours of family fun for any gathering or party

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
